Kerja Sama dengan Garuda Lanjut, Penerbangan Sriwijaya Besok Normal Lagi?
07 Nov 2019, 16:08 by Trio Hamdani


Foto: detikFoto

Jakarta - Penerbangan Sriwijaya Air banyak yang tertunda hari ini, Kamis (7/11/2019). Peristiwa merupakan buntut dari kerja sama Garuda Indonesia dan Sriwijaya yang sempat terputus.Selama ini Sriwijaya Air menggandeng Garuda Indonesia untuk perawatan dan pemeliharaan pesawat. Setelah kerja sama dengan Garuda Indonesia dilanjutkan lagi, apakah penerbangan Sriwijaya Air besok bakal normal lagi?"Insyaallah. ya dengan struktur yang baru, dengan satu penanggung jawab yang baru mereka tentunya akan eksis dan kita upayakan tidak ada cancel dan delay," kata Budi di Gedung Transmedia, Jakarta, Kamis (7/11/2019).Struktur baru yang dimaksud Budi Karya adalah perombakan direksi di Sriwijaya Air. Menurut Budi direksi yang diganti adalah mereka yang khusus menangani masalah SDM, perawatan pesawat, dan operasional. Cuma, dia mengaku belum tahu identitas penggantinya. Perubahan direksi tersebut merupakan kesepakatan Garuda Indonesia dan Sriwijaya Air dan berlaku mulai Kamis ini."Per hari ini. Saya nggak tahu personilnya siapa tapi hari ini di-settle (ditetapkan). Direktur SDM, Direktur Maintenance sama Direktur Operasi," terang mantan Dirut PT Angkasa Pura II itu.Budi menambahkan Kementerian Perhubungan memastikan terpenuhinya keselamatan, keamanan dan kenyamanan calon pengguna Sriwijaya Air yang mengalami dampak pembatalan sejumlah rute penerbangan."Kami Kementerian Perhubungan itu sangat concern tentang safety. Oleh karenanya apabila terjadi gonjang-ganjing itu pertama kali yang kita pikirkan. Nah dengan dasar itu kami sudah memanggil Garuda Indonesia dan Sriwijaya untuk memastikan safety," tambahnya.Simak Video "Garuda Indonesia Larang Penumpang Bawa MacBook Pro 15 Inci"[Gambas:Video 20detik](toy/hns)

Collaboration with Garuda Continues, Will Sriwijaya Flight be Normal Again tomorrow?
Nov 7 2019, 16:08 by Trio Hamdani


Photo: detikPhoto

Jakarta - Many Sriwijaya Air flights were delayed today, Thursday (11/07/2019). The event was the aftermath of the cooperation between Garuda Indonesia and Sriwijaya which had been interrupted. During this time Sriwijaya Air took Garuda Indonesia for the maintenance and maintenance of the aircraft. After further cooperation with Garuda Indonesia, will Sriwijaya Air's flight be normal tomorrow? "God willing, yes, with the new structure, with a new person in charge they will certainly exist and we will try to not cancel and delay," Budi said. Transmedia Building, Jakarta, Thursday (11/07/2019). The new structure referred to by Budi Karya is a reshuffle of directors in Sriwijaya Air. According to Budi, the directors replaced were those who specifically handled HR, aircraft maintenance and operational issues. But, he claimed not to know the identity of his successor. Changes to the board of directors are an agreement between Garuda Indonesia and Sriwijaya Air and take effect starting this Thursday. "As of today. I don't know who the personnel are but today it is set. HR Director, Maintenance Director and Operations Director," explained the former Managing Director of PT Angkasa Pura II. Budi added that the Ministry of Transportation ensured the fulfillment of the safety, security and comfort of potential Sriwijaya Air users who experienced the effect of canceling a number of flight routes. "We, the Transportation Ministry are very concerned about safety. Therefore, if the turbulence occurs the first time we think about it. So on that basis we have called Garuda Indonesia and Sriwijaya to ensure safety, "he added.
